pages.text: 带有元素倾向的药草总是显得很挑剔 - 它们的喜好就像是元素那样变化无常。元素土可以加快所有生长于其上的植物的生长速度，且你也可以向元素土中注入额外的元素，经过这样处理的元素土可以使得对应元素倾向的植株在其上生长。

$(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)地狱鳞茎$()可以在火素土上生长。 Obtained by dropping a piece of elemental soil into a pool of lava.$(br2)Other plants grown on magmatic soil will have drops cooked when harvested, if cookable. In addition, each plant harvested may drop experience.

$(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() grows on aquatic soil. Obtained by soaking elemental soil for a short period of time in water.$(br2)Normal plants grown on the soil will be harvested automagically, the drops placed in containers below the soil or on the surface if none exists. $(info) Gravel beneath prevents this behaviour.

$(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berries$() grow on caelic, air-bound soil. Obtained by exposing elemental soil to the airy heights and the open sky.$(br2)Normal plants can also be grown on caelic soil, and the soil will grow them much faster than normal.

$(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() grow on terran soil. Obtained by exposing elemental soil to the dark, covered depths of underground caves and chasms.$(br2)Normal plants can also be grown on terran soil, and the fertile earth will yield much more for the crop.
